title: The Teeth - development and care
creator_credit: ERPI Classroom Films and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: This film deals with the care of the teeth, based on a knowledge of what teeth are, how they are formed, and the factors which effect their growth, formation, and preservation.
